EmailTemplate.name: 05_19_2014 TechEd Follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: We Met At TechEd. You Were Awesome.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Software-Driven Control for the Software-Defined World {{lead.first name:default=}}, Thanks for introducing yourself at TechEd 2014. If you missed VMTurbo's live demo of ESX-to-Azure workload migration, you can watch the recording here <http://www.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-to-demo-one-click-vsphere-esx-vm-to-azure-migration-at-teched/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=teched>.
VMTurbo is revolutionizing virtualization management with end-to-end Software-Driven Control. If you liked what you saw at TechEd, we hope you'll take VMTurbo Operations Manager into your environment, free for 30 days.
Call us for a Demo, and ask for a VMT-Shirt. It will be your proof that you were on the vanguard. Learn More <http://go.vmturbo.com/cloud-edition-download.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=teched> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
